content: **enjoy the fonte cowl pattern as a forever free download i d love it if you added the pattern to your faves and hope you knit happily~** > **the fonte cowl knit kits come in great color combinations and are > discounted and available at yarnz2go 1 the cowl is knitted both in the round and flat a staggered cable stitch pattern is done without cable needle and i for one love that fact don t you the bottom edge gets knitted flat and also gets a very stylish and easy to do crochet chenille touch you can flip that part over and create a cute collar for a cowl this one gives you styling options the pattern is written and does oﬀer a chart for the cable pattern the unblocked cowl measures 24 in circumference and 9 5 in height **yarn** c1- a single skein of lively 153 yards/75 grams of cotton/acrylic in a dk weight c2- a mini skein of chenille in a bulky weight 4 yards for the accent around the neckline available in knit kits at ** yarnz2go 2 ** **notions needed** us size 8 11 mm circular needle 20 51 cm in length crochet hook size i 5 5 mm for pink accent stitch marker tapestry needle or crochet hook for finishing **gauge** 15 sts and 21 row in 4 of stockinette stitch **techniques applied** knitting and purling both in the round and flat cable knitting without cable needle binding oﬀ loosely weaving in ends blocking is optional the sample shown was left unblocked **enjoy the knit** and do share photos of your pretty cowls on project pages yours may just be featured~ 1 https //yarnz2go myshopify com/products/fonte-cowl _pos=1&_psq=fonte&_ss=e&_v=1 0 2 https //yarnz2go myshopify com/products/fonte-cowl _pos=1&_psq=fonte&_ss=e&_v=1 0
